# `WheelPicker` Definition

Wheel picker component with selectable items

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| id | `string` | No | Unique identifier for the wheel picker (generated by backend) |
| items | [`WheelPickerItem[]`](wheelpickeritem-definition.md) | Yes | Items in the wheel picker |
